mapper.select: -- 私信会话属性 SELECT bw.id, bw.first_user_id, bu1.user_name AS first_user_name, bu1.photo AS first_user_photo, bw.second_user_id, bu2.user_name AS second_user_name, bu2.photo AS second_user_photo FROM boki_whisper bw JOIN boki_user bu1 ON bw.first_user_id = bu1.id JOIN boki_user bu2 ON bw.second_user_id = bu2.id WHERE (bw.first_user_id = #{firstUserId} AND bw.second_user_id = #{secondUserId} OR bw.first_user_id = #{secondUserId} AND bw.second_user_id = #{firstUserId}) AND bw.is_deleted = 'n'; -- 私信会话对白 SELECT user_id,content,create_time FROM boki_whisper_detail WHERE (user_id = #{firstUserId} AND target_user_id = #{secondUserId} OR user_id = #{secondUserId} AND target_user_id = #{firstUserId}) AND is_deleted = 'n' ORDER BY create_time LIMIT 40;

-- 总数 SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM boki_whisper WHERE (second_user_id = #{userId} AND first_user_id != #{userId} AND show_in_second = 'y' OR second_user_id != #{userId} AND first_user_id = #{userId} AND show_in_first = 'y') AND is_deleted = 'n'; -- 私信列表 SELECT bw.id, bw.first_user_id AS target_user_id, bu.user_name AS target_user_name, bu.photo AS target_user_photo, bw.last_content, bw.modified_time AS lastReplyTime FROM boki_whisper bw JOIN boki_user bu ON bu.id = bw.first_user_id WHERE (bw.second_user_id = #{userId} AND bw.first_user_id != #{userId} AND bw.show_in_second = 'y' OR bw.second_user_id != #{userId} AND bw.first_user_id = #{userId} AND bw.show_in_first = 'y') AND bw.is_deleted = 'n' ORDER BY lastReplyTime DESC LIMIT #{start},#{end};
